resources.string: " Pentago is an abstract board game for two participants, which, for all the simplicity of the rules, will make you have a healthy brain.\n" " So, before you is the playing field, consisting of 4 rotating squares. There are 9 holes on each square to place balls.\n"

" In his move, the player must take two actions: place one ball in any free well, turn any quarter" "of the field 90 degrees clockwise or counterclockwise. After that, the move is transferred to the opponent.\n"

" The player who first reaches the vertical, horizontal or diagonal row of 5 balls of his own color becomes the winner.
" "If the player who laid the ball receives a row of five balls, then it is not necessary to turn a quarter of the field.
" "If no one was able to do this or a turn of the square made up two colored lines at the same time a draw is announced.
"
